betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§oJust kidding, Silicon Wafers in this mod are perfectly fungible.§r

§9Silicon Boules§r are made in the §3EBF§r with lots of §aSilicon Dust§r and a small amount of §aGallium Arsenide§r.
After making the Boule, cut it in the §3Cutting Machine§r to get 16 Silicon Wafers ready for engraving.

The best §aSilicon§r source at this point shall be either §dGlass Dust§r, or §dSodalite§r.

§cWarning:§r Each Silicon Boule takes 7.5 minutes to make at 120 EU/t, or 1,080,000 EU! If the EBF loses power midway, the recipe will start to §close progress§r. Be sure you have enough power before starting.
